message.name: COMMAND_SHORT
message.description: A short command message for those messages only requiring one parameter. Th
message.field: Command ID, as defined by MAV_CMD enum.is was established to reduce the bandwidth required of messages not requiring as much parameterized data.
System which should execute the command
Component which should execute the command, 0 for all components
0: First transmission of this command. 1-255: Confirmation transmissions (e.g. for kill command)
Parameter as defined by MAV_CMD enum.

message.name: EXECUTE_SPATIAL_ACTION
message.description: Send a spatial command telling the vehicle to manuever based on the command type.
message.field: System which should execute the command
Component which should execute the command, 0 for all components
Command ID, as defined by UXV_CMD enum.
The coordinate system of the MISSION. see UXV_FRAME in mavlink_types.h
How many dimensions the position object truly is captured in.
Mask indicating the invalid dimensions of the position object. 1's indicate a dimesion is invalid.
Parameter 1, as defined by UXV_CMD enum.
Parameter 2, as defined by UXV_CMD enum.
Parameter 3, as defined by UXV_CMD enum.
Parameter 4, as defined by UXV_CMD enum.
Parameter 5, as defined by UXV_CMD enum.
Parameter 6, as defined by UXV_CMD enum.
Parameter 7, as defined by UXV_CMD enum.
